data.name: Sample - Fortinet FortiDDoS - 1.0.0
data.description: FortiDDoS Protection Solution defends enterprise data centers against DDoS attacks by leveraging an extensive collection of known DDoS methodologies, creating a multi-layered approach to mitigate attacks.  It also analyzes the behavior of data to detect new attacks, allowing it to stop zero-day threats.

workflows.description: Retrieves the Protection Profiles details from the FortiDDoS appliance based on the Service Protection Profile (SPP) name and resource name you have specified. The protection profiles settings located at: Protection Profiles section.
workflows.name: Get Protection Profiles

workflows.description: Updates the protection profiles settings based on the SPP name, resource name, and resource arguments you have specified. The protection profiles settings located at: Protection Profiles section.
workflows.name: Update Protection Profiles Settings

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiDDoS: Update Protection Profiles Settings

workflows.description: Retrieves all global settings from the FortiDDoS appliance. The global settings are located at: Global Settings > Settings > Settings.
workflows.name: Get Global Settings

workflows.description: Retrieves the global service protection profile from the FortiDDoS appliance based on the resource name you have specified. The global service protection profiles are located at: Global Settings > Service Protection Profiles.
workflows.name: Get Global Service Protection Profiles

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiDDoS: Get Global Service Protection Profiles

routes.name: Start-> Get Global Service Protection Profiles

workflows.description: Retrieves the internal sub-resources from settings in the FortiDDoS global settings based on the resource name you have specified. The global settings are located at: Global Settings > Settings.
workflows.name: Get Settings

workflows.description: Retrieves the global setting address of the FortiDDoS appliance based on the resource name you have specified. The global settings address is located at: Global Settings > Address.
workflows.name: Get Global Settings Address

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiDDoS: Get Global Settings Address

workflows.description: Retrieves the IP reputation details of the FortiDDoS appliance. The IP reputation details are located at: Global Settings > IP Reputation.
workflows.name: Get IP Reputation

workflows.description: Retrieves the domain reputation details of the FortiDDoS appliance. The IP reputation details are located at: Global Settings > Domain Reputation.
workflows.name: Get Domain Reputation

workflows.description: Retrieves the proxy IP details of the FortiDDoS appliance. The proxy IP located at: Global Settings > Proxy IP.
workflows.name: Get Proxy IP

workflows.description: Retrieves the proxy IP policy details of the FortiDDoS appliance. The proxy IP policy located at: Global Settings > Proxy IP Policy.
workflows.name: Get Proxy IP Policy

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiDDoS: Get Proxy IP Policy

workflows.description: Retrieves the 'do not track policy' settings of the FortiDDoS appliance based on the resource name you have specified. The do not track policy located at: Global Settings > Do Not Track Policy.
workflows.name: Get Do Not Track Policy

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiDDoS: Get Do Not Track Policy

routes.name: Start-> Get Do Not Track Policy

workflows.description: Retrieves the access control list details of global settings from the FortiDDoS appliance. The access control list located at: Global Settings > Access Control List.
workflows.name: Get Access Control List

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiDDoS: Get Access Control List

workflows.description: Retrieves the bypass MAC details of the FortiDDoS appliance. The bypass MAC details are located at: Global Settings > Bypass MAC.
workflows.name: Get Bypass MAC

workflows.description: Retrieves the system settings information from FortiDDoS based on the resource name you have specified. The system settings details are located at: System.
workflows.name: Get System Settings

workflows.description: Retrieves log information from the FortiDDoS appliance based on the resource name you have specified. The log settings details are located at: Log & Report > Log Configuration.
workflows.name: Get Log Settings

workflows.description: Retrieves attack information from FortiDDoS based on the SPP name, attack subtype, direction, and period you have specified. The attack information located at: Log & Report > Executive Summary.
workflows.name: Get Attack Information

workflows.description: Adds a new Distress ACL to the FortiDDoS appliance based on the Mkey, destination, and other input parameters you have specified. The distress ACL located at: Global Settings > Access Control List > Advanced Settings > Distress ACL.
workflows.name: Add Distress ACL

workflows.description: Deletes a specific Distress ACL from the FortiDDoS appliance based on the name of the distress ACL you have specified. The distress ACL located at: Global Settings > Access Control List > Advanced Settings > Distress ACL.
workflows.name: Delete Distress ACL

workflows.description: Adds a new SPP Policy to the FortiDDoS appliance based on subnet ID, Mkey name, IP version, and the input parameters you have specified. The new SPP policy details are located at: Global Settings > Service Protection Profiles > SPP Policy.
workflows.name: Add Service Protection Profile Policy

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiDDoS: Add Service Protection Profile Policy

routes.name: Start-> Add Service Protection Profile Policy

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all Service Protection Profile Policies from the FortiDDoS appliance. The service protection profile policy details are located at: Global Settings > Service Protection Profiles > SPP Policy.
workflows.name: Get Service Protection Profile Policy

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiDDoS: Get Service Protection Profile Policy

routes.name: Start-> Get Service Protection Profile Policy

workflows.description: Deletes a specific Service Protection Profile Policy from the FortiDDoS appliance based on the name of the SPP policy you have specified. The service protection profile policy details are located at: Global Settings > Service Protection Profiles > SPP Policy.
workflows.name: Delete Service Protection Profile Policy

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiDDoS: Delete Service Protection Profile Policy

routes.name: Start-> Delete Service Protection Profile Policy

workflows.description: Adds a new legitimate DNS Query to the FortiDDoS appliance based on the query, type, and other input parameters you have specified. The legitimate DNS query located at: Global Settings > Legitimate DNS Queries
workflows.name: Add Legitimate DNS Query

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiDDoS: Add Legitimate DNS Query

workflows.description: Deletes a specific legitimate DNS query from the FortiDDoS appliance based on the domain, type, and class you have specified. The legitimate DNS query located at: Global Settings > Legitimate DNS Queries
workflows.name: Delete Legitimate DNS Query

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiDDoS: Delete Legitimate DNS Query

workflows.description: Generate BGP flow specifications based on the vendor name, destination under attack, and threshold you have specified. The generated BGP flowspec located at: Log & Report > Flowspec.
workflows.name: Generate BGP Flowspec
